languages.text: {n}Уж {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}кто-то, а вы{/d} сполна понимаете важность снабжения армии. В вашей голове моментально рождается дерзкий план: под видом ссылки отправить леди Моллес-Секандас на окраинные миры, где она выстроит производство пайков.{/n}

{n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}better than anyone{/d} understand the importance of supplying an army. You immediately hatch an audacious plan: send Lady Molles-Secundas to one of the fringe worlds under the pretext of exile and have her set up the production of rations there.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Уж {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}кто-то, а вы{/d} сполна понимаете важность снабжения армии. В вашей голове моментально рождается дерзкий план: под видом ссылки отправить леди Моллес-Секандас на окраинные миры, где она выстроит производство пайков.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}比所有人{/d}都更了解军队给养的重要性。你立刻想出了一个大胆的计划：你可以打着流放的幌子，将莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人送到某个边缘世界，让她在那里继续生产食物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}better than anyone{/d} understand the importance of supplying an army. You immediately hatch an audacious plan: send Lady Molles-Secundas to one of the fringe worlds under the pretext of exile and have her set up the production of rations there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}比所有人{/d}都更了解军队给养的重要性。你立刻想出了一个大胆的计划：你可以打着流放的幌子，将莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人送到某个边缘世界，让她在那里继续生产食物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}誰よりも{/d}軍の補給の重要性を理解している。そこで、すぐに大胆な計画を思いついた。レディ・モレス・セクンダスを追放という名目で辺境惑星のひとつに送り、そこで食料の生産を立ち上げさせるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}better than anyone{/d} understand the importance of supplying an army. You immediately hatch an audacious plan: send Lady Molles-Secundas to one of the fringe worlds under the pretext of exile and have her set up the production of rations there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}誰よりも{/d}軍の補給の重要性を理解している。そこで、すぐに大胆な計画を思いついた。レディ・モレス・セクンダスを追放という名目で辺境惑星のひとつに送り、そこで食料の生産を立ち上げさせるのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sabes {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}mejor que nadie{/d} lo importante que es suministrar a un ejército. Ideas un plan atrevido al instante: enviar a lady Molles-Secundas a un mundo periférico haciéndolo pasar por exilio y ponerla al mando de la producción de raciones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}better than anyone{/d} understand the importance of supplying an army. You immediately hatch an audacious plan: send Lady Molles-Secundas to one of the fringe worlds under the pretext of exile and have her set up the production of rations there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sabes {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}mejor que nadie{/d} lo importante que es suministrar a un ejército. Ideas un plan atrevido al instante: enviar a lady Molles-Secundas a un mundo periférico haciéndolo pasar por exilio y ponerla al mando de la producción de raciones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du verstehst {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}besser als alle anderen{/d}, wie wichtig die Bereitstellung einer Armee ist. Du schmiedest sofort einen gewagten Plan: Lady Molles-Secundas unter dem Vorwand des Exils auf eine der Randwelten schicken und dort die Produktion von Rationen aufbauen lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}better than anyone{/d} understand the importance of supplying an army. You immediately hatch an audacious plan: send Lady Molles-Secundas to one of the fringe worlds under the pretext of exile and have her set up the production of rations there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du verstehst {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}besser als alle anderen{/d}, wie wichtig die Bereitstellung einer Armee ist. Du schmiedest sofort einen gewagten Plan: Lady Molles-Secundas unter dem Vorwand des Exils auf eine der Randwelten schicken und dort die Produktion von Rationen aufbauen lassen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ordu bulundurmanın ehemmiyetini {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}herkesten daha iyi{/d} biliyorsun. İvedilikle cesurca bir plan hazırlıyorsun: Leydi Molles-Secundas'ı uygun bir sürgün gerekçesiyle uç dünyalardan birine sevk edeceksin ve bölgedeki erzak üretim faaliyetlerini organize etmesi kendisine tevdi edilecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}better than anyone{/d} understand the importance of supplying an army. You immediately hatch an audacious plan: send Lady Molles-Secundas to one of the fringe worlds under the pretext of exile and have her set up the production of rations there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir ordu bulundurmanın ehemmiyetini {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}herkesten çok daha iyi{/d} biliyorsun. İvedilikle cesurca bir plan hazırlıyorsun: Leydi Molles-Secundas'ı uygun bir sürgün gerekçesiyle uç dünyalardan birine sevk edeceksin ve bölgedeki erzak üretim faaliyetlerini organize etmesi kendisine tevdi edilecek.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous savez {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}mieux que quiconque{/d} à quel point il est important d'approvisionner une armée. Vous élaborez alors un plan audacieux : envoyer dame Molles-Secundas dans un monde reculé sous couvert d'exil pour qu'elle puisse y produire des rations.{/n}
